title: State v. Keith Davis, Jr. – Episode 2 – Country on the West
description:
April 29, 2019 / In this episode of "The State vs. Keith Davis, Jr", hear about what happened on the morning of June 7, 2015 according to Charles Holden, the hack driver. Plus, meet the four Baltimore Police Department officers who shot Keith Davis Jr. and learn abut use of force investigations from two former cops.

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions, Spencer Burdette, Chris Zabriskie, and Mctrnm.

This episode was sponsored by For Hers, Boll and Branch, and Fab Fit Fun. 

www.ForHers.com/Undisclosed

www.BollandBranch.com promo code Undisclosed

www.FabFitFun.com promo code Undisclosed

#undisclosed #freekeithdavisjr
